Question & Options:
What themes are central to the rivalry between Angier and Borden in *The Prestige*?
Options:
A. Obsession and secrecy
B. Class warfare
C. Friendship and betrayal
D. Theft of illusions
Correct Answer: Obsession and secrecy, Class warfare, Theft of illusions
